## Options type

General options for `@csstools/postcss-tape`<!-- -->. These affect the entire test run, not individual test cases.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type Options = {
    skipPackageNameCheck?: boolean;
};
```

## Example


```js
import { postcssTape } from '@csstools/postcss-tape';
import plugin from 'your-postcss-plugin';

postcssTape(plugin, {
  skipPackageNameCheck: true,
})(...);
```
